This is a brush treasure adventure game across the heavens. The protagonist awakens the power and can freely travel through different planes such as Xiuxian, history, martial arts, Qi, magic, and future. Collect equipment, spirits, characters and cheats distributed across all planes through battle. Bring rare treasures back to the real world, complete quests, exchange resources, purchase assets, and continue to strengthen your strength until you break through the universe!


While exploring the plane, you can also recruit the strong side to join the team. These characters have different talents and qualifications, when recruiting, he may be just a warrior or a warrior, but as long as the training, any character can be broken into a god!


There are all kinds of treasures, equipment, secrets, there are all kinds of powerful and rare spirit beasts. Brush treasure, explore, hunt, quest, explore!


The core of gameplay is character development. The game provides a rich cultivation system, first of all, including the level, occupation, level three main growth line, and joined the skills, transfer, talent, adjutant, pet beast, sky book, MEDALS and other multi-dimensional God line!


You can sell the treasures in the real world for money, you can arrange the spirits of the sky to work for you in your company, and you can even put the captured spirits in the zoo for admission. These revenues will fund your exploration of even more powerful dimensions!
